channel.title: Custom sounds/writing a QC/Skinning a Custom model
channel.description:
How would one put custom sounds into a the hammer sound selector? I want to have an intercom voice that goes off when a power generator is shut down or turned on, and I would really hate to go with a text message in the center of the screen.
As a second question, how do you write a QC file? I am also working on a Sourceified version of the final level of Super Mario 64 and have a Bob-omb model all set up in Google Sketch up and exported, but how do i write a QC?
How would a skin be made for said Bob-omb? I can have a purple/black checkerboard thing laying around.
AND LASTLY.... how do i get the HL2 EP2 specific entities in HL2? thank you in advance, to anyone who can help.
Edit: I've Tried [url]https://developer.valvesoftware.com/[/url] and couldn't find anything. that site is a pain in the ass.

item.title: Custom sounds/writing a QC/Skinning a Custom model
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Let me point you to the exact pages…

  1. https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Sound, you obviously CBF looking, so you need to stick them in your mods sound/* directory
  2. https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Qc
  3. https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Model_Creation_Overview
  4. Use the EP2 engine

Read full topic
item.source: Custom sounds/writing a QC/Skinning a Custom model
